details: https://lowendspirit.com/locations.html

Terms:
* ZERO SUPPORT
* Available for 1 day only
* NO tor/torrenting
* 30% CPU use limit over 24 hours avg 
* If you cancel 1 the others go to full price.
* AUP breaches result in immediate termination of all products in a given account without warning, if you choose not to read what you agree to then you live by that choice.
* If you have to use a sentence that has the following structure or similar "I know xyz but I expect abc" then this product is not for you.
* if you need help signing up, this product is not for you

Instructions:
This is a bundle link, you configure one product, then it takes you to the next and then the next so you can set unique host names and passwords.
